attributes.action: Insist on Parents of Unruley Children attend Parenting School!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lets help our country maintain a sense of pride and respect for each other and ourselves, as well as law abiding citizens, by insisting on parents of persistently unruley children to attend parenting school.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
